sections: This is the perfect modern collectible.

, this beauty is ready to stun everyone it crosses paths with. It's up for grabs now, and this modern collectible is one of the finer examples you'll be able to find on the market today.

, the interior features black full leather for a luxurious ride. Powering the wheels of this hot little German sports car is a twin-turbo 3.8L flat-six, backed by a seven-speed PDK dual-clutch transaxle and all-wheel drive.

19-inch RS Spyder wheels, and has dynamic cornering bi-xenon headlights, the Sport Chrono package, ventilated and heated comfort seats, a Sport Design steering wheel, automatic climate control, PCM with navigation, and Bluetooth.

, the black leather interior is contrasted with the white stitching on the dash, console, and door panels. Alcantara headliner is a luxurious addition, with added features like cruise control, auto climate controls, chronograph on the dash, heated and vented seats, and embossed Porsche headrest crests.
